gov.niarl.his.privacyca

Class TpmSymmetricKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.niarl.his.privacyca.TpmSymmetricKey

  • public class TpmSymmetricKey
extends Object

    This class is for the TCG's TPM_SYMMETRIC_KEY structure.

    Author:
    schawki
